product_name: Gregory Pace Handheld Water Bottle - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: This women-specific handheld water bottle is the ideal grab-and-go hydrator for your daily run. Its design reduces grip fatigue while providing space for small items like car keys, ID or energy gels.
short_description: This women-specific handheld water bottle is the ideal grab-and-go hydrator for your daily run. Its design reduces grip fatigue while providing space for small items like car keys, ID or energy gels.
